mapper.update: update user_modify_record set user_modify_type = #{userModifyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_modify_time = #{userModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_modify_before = #{userModifyBefore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_modify_after = #{userModifyAfter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_modufy_result = #{userModufyResult,jdbcType=BIT} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_modify_type, user_modify_time, user_modify_before, user_modify_after, user_modufy_result from user_modify_record where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
